casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jawanz BACON No. 266P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Bacon, Jawanz. James Bernier, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 31st of August 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
